description: Sussex Police wants to speak to the man pictured in CCTV footage after a sexual assault report.
title: Sussex Police issue man's image after Hastings sex assault report
title_page: Sussex Police issue man's image after Hastings sex assault report - BBC News
maintext:
Police have issued a CCTV image of a man they would like to speak to after a report of a sexual assault in East Sussex.
The incident happened near the Priory Meadow bus stops in Queen's Road, Hastings, at about 14:15 GMT on 12 February.
A woman, who cannot be identified for legal reasons, was approached from behind by a man unknown to her, who sexually assaulted her by touching, Sussex Police said.
The woman was left shaken and has received support from specially-trained officers.
